subject: News Summary
body:
CBSNews.com






April 24, 2007


                              		
                              		
                              	  Home | U.S. | World | Politics | SciTech | Health | Entertainment | Business | Opinion | Sports | Blogs | Interactives | Video



                              	
                              	  The Early Show | CBS Evening News | 48 Hours | 60 Minutes | The Saturday Early Show | CBS Sunday Morning | Face The Nation






TOP STORIESTillman Tale "Pure Fiction": Brother
The brother of Pat Tillman broke his three-year silence, telling Congress the military's heroic recounting of the NFL player-turned
                        Army Ranger's death was "pure fiction." He assailed the Pentagon for trying to "deceive" the family and the nation. More...
• 9 U.S. Troops Die In Attack On Iraq Base
                     					| Watch• 4th Grader Brings Grenade To Texas School• David Halberstam Killed In Bay Area CrashU.S.Landis: They're Out To Get Me
Tour de France champion Floyd Landis responds to a French newspaper report that says his follow-up tests on backup urine samples
                        showed traces of a banned synthetic testosterone. More...
• Border Patrol Agent Charged With Murder• David Halberstam Killed In Bay Area Crash• Classes Resume At Virginia Tech
                     					| Watch• More StoriesWorld9 U.S. Troops Die In Attack On Iraq Base
Nine U.S. troops were killed and 20 more wounded when a suicide bomber attacked a forward patrol base in the deadly Diyala
                        province, north of Baghdad. Also, unknown gunmen in Iraqi army uniforms and vehicles have raided a village, killing six people. More...Watch: War Funding Deadlock Continues
• 74 Die In Ethiopian Oil Field Raid• Getting Old In Cuba• Hamas Militants: The Truce Is Over• More StoriesPoliticsKarl Rove Under The Microscope
A little-known federal investigative unit is set to launch a probe of the activities of one of the best-known members of the
                        Bush administration: political strategist Karl Rove. Joel Roberts has the highlights of the day's headlines. More...
• Tillman Tale "Pure Fiction": Brother• Hillary Bio By Bernstein Due Out June 19• Reid: Bush In "Denial" On Iraq
                     					| Watch• More StoriesHealthStudy: No Abortion-Breast Cancer Link
A 10-year Harvard study of 105,716 women finds no link between abortion and breast cancer. More...
• Obesity Costly In Workers' Comp• New Drug May Treat Muscular Dystrophy• Is FDA Capable Of Keeping Food Safe?
                     					| Watch• More StoriesSciTechUnraveling The Mysteries Of Sex Appeal
Women seem to perpetually date the same type of guy and there are a few good reasons for that. An article in the May issue
                        of Cosmopolitan magazine called the "Secrets of Sexual Attraction" explains why women are drawn to certain guys. More...
• California Leads Way In Tech Industry• NASA Captures 3D Images Of Sun
                     					| Watch• MTV Shows Car Owners How To Go Green• More StoriesBusinessGender Wage Gap Persists, Report Says
According to a new report from the American Association of University Women, one year after graduating from college, women
                        make 20 percent less than men. But great gains have been made and an expert says women need to be more assertive.  More...
• Toyota Is World's No. 1 Automaker• Betting On The Next "Big Thing"• CBS Radio Suspends 2 For Racial Prank• More StoriesEntertainmentThings Sanjaya Learned On "Idol"
During a brief visit with David Letterman on Monday, Sanjaya Malakar rattled off this list of the top 10 "Things I Learned
                        from 'American Idol' " More...Watch: Sanjaya Reads The 'Top Ten'
• Basinger Denies Leaking Baldwin Rant
                     					| Watch• CBS Radio Suspends 2 For Racial Prank• Rosie Takes Aim At Murdoch At Luncheon• More StoriesOpinionPoll: Little Change In Views On Handguns
Last week's shooting rampage at Virginia Tech did little to change Americans' views on gun control, according to a CBS
                        News/N.Y. Times poll. A majority continues to favor stricter handgun laws, but oppose a ban on all handguns. More...Watch: Virginia Tech and Gun Control
• Troops In Iraq Plead For Support

                     					| Watch• Andy Loves His Books• More StoriesCBS NEWS BROADCASTSThe Early Show: Living: Unraveling The Mysteries Of Sex Appeal
Women seem to perpetually date the same type of guy and there are a few good reasons for that. An article in the May issue
                        of Cosmopolitan magazine called the "Secrets of Sexual Attraction" explains why women are drawn to certain guys. More...
